Package moviepackage

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
moviepackage.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
Class of Movie. Contains Common Details, such as MovieTitle, Synopsis, Director and Cast for customer use. Contains Staff Details, such as a unique identifier, sales tracking, and multiplier for pricing.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(String movieTitle, MovieStatus movieStatus, String synopsis, String director, String cast, AgeRestriction ageRestriction, MovieType movieType, int duration, ArrayList<Review> reviews)
      Constructs a Movie object based on the parameters. Used during serialization when reviews are also specified in object data.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - Movie Title
      movieStatus - Status of Movie
      synopsis - Synopsis of Movie
      director - Director of Movie
      cast - Movie Cast
      ageRestriction - Age Restriction of Movie from Enumeration
      movieType - Type of Movie from Enumberation
      duration - Duration of Movie
      reviews - Array of Reviews for Each Object

    • Movie

      public Movie(String movieTitle, MovieStatus movieStatus, String synopsis, String director, String cast, AgeRestriction ageRestriction, MovieType movieType, int duration)
      Constructor for movie object. Used in staff view when the reviews array is initialized as an empty ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - Movie Title
      movieStatus - Status of Movie
      synopsis - Synopsis of Movie
      director - Director of Movie
      cast - Movie Cast
      ageRestriction - Age Restriction of Movie from Enumeration
      movieType - Type of Movie from Enumberation
      duration - Duration of Movie

    • Movie

      protected Movie(Movie that)
      Protected constructor for a Movie that is only used to create a deep copy of the specified object.
      Parameters:
      that - movie object to make a deep copy of.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Returns:
      movieID parameter of the object.

    • incrementInstance

      protected static void incrementInstance(int toIncrement)
      Protected function that is used to add x values to the instanceCounter of the movie class. Used by MovieManager when movies are serialized to ensure that the next movie generated has an ID that does not clash with pre-serialized movies.
      Parameters:
      toIncrement - amount to increment by.

    • getInstance

      protected static int getInstance()
      Protected function that is used to return the value of the Static instance counter.
      Returns:
      value of instanceCounter.

    • deleteMovie

      public void deleteMovie()
      Marks the current movie status as "END_OF_SHOWING" enum status. Used to achieve a "soft delete" to remove the movie from the Customer view but keep it in staff view.
